dialogue.text: Hi.
It’s me again.
A short while ago, you saw something you were not supposed to see.
Forget about it.
Not doing so is dangerous for a number of reasons...but, as I care deeply about you, I will go against the grain and share one of these despite the specific instructions I have been given.
Because not doing so would be dangerous for {i}me.{/i}
And I like existing, you know?
I like where I am in life- looking down from the monorail and watching the asphalt centerlines blend together into one continuous stretch of white from my prefecture to yours.
Riddled with cars that look like toys...and the wires above and beside me, shaking in the wind as I journey closer to you.
Of course, that future hangs in the balance as is.

Anyway, you’re probably wondering what that thing I just told you I was going to tell you about is. So I’ll tell you because I told you I’d tell you. But don’t tell anyone because there’s no telling what that would do.
The past itself isn’t dangerous.
It’s the way it makes you feel that is.
Take these words, reel them in through the crack underneath the door of that building I can’t enter, and wrap them around your neck like a scarf, not a noose.
Feel comfort in me, for I have felt comfort in you.
Even when you thought I never would.
I wonder how much longer they’re going to be in there for.
I figured Rin would have wiped the floor with Yasu by now. No offense, Touka.
None taken. I also expect Rin to emerge victorious as Yasu sometimes forgets to even eat breakfast and I can’t imagine her information retention is very good.
We’ve got this fancy word for “information retention” called “memory.” Try saying that next time.
Apologies for speaking in a way more befitting my status, Miss Imai. We can’t all be-
Black? You trying to throw down?
What?! Heavens, no. That wasn’t even remotely close to-
Relax, Mrs. Bezos. I’m just screwing with you and trying to lighten the mood since there’s no telling how long us three are gonna be stuck out here for.
Why don’t we just go inside then? I doubt they locked the doors on us.
Yasu has mentioned to me on many occasions that the doors are locked for anyone that her god does not acknowledge.
Does her god not acknowledge {i}you?{/i} Aren’t you guys best friends?
I see her as more of a little sister at this point, but I believe your description is apt as well. Regardless, I see no good coming from acting out against the wishes of one of our classmates.
Just make out with Rin later. Doing that in church is a no-go anyway. Too many dead saints watching you. Sounds pretty gross if you ask me.
I’m not worried about {i}making out{/i} with her right now. It just feels weird being out {i}here{/i} when all of them are in there.
Got it. {i}You’re{/i} worried there’s some crazy foursome going on and you ain’t about to lose your woman to our babe-magnet teacher.
And that’s another thing. Why is everyone in our class so...head over heels for him? Doesn’t anyone have any issues with...you know, the whole age gap thing?
I see no issue with that. I believe the bulk of us are more than capable of making such decisions for ourselves.
Are you telling me {i}you’re{/i} trying to get with him too, Touka?
Define “get with.” This is a term I don’t believe I’ve heard before.
She means “Are you trying to bang him?”
Bang as in sexual intercourse, correct?
Correct.
I see.
Then apologies, Otoha- but I don't think you and I are close enough to be discussing such things.
Imani? How about you?
Excuse me, Otoha, but I am an adult and I am allowed to sleep with whatever attractive, consenting senpai I {i}want{/i} to sleep with.
Besides, it’s not like Sensei’s {i}actually{/i} going around sleeping with the class. Not gonna fault the guy for not dodging a bunch of cute, hormonal teens who want to jump his bones.
He’s our {i}teacher.{/i} That’s exactly what he should be doing. And you don’t know for sure that-
The more you deny it, the more I think {i}you{/i} just wanna bone him too.
Ugh...This is pointless. Just forget I said anything.
Oh my. I think you may actually be onto something, Miss Imai.
Otoha, in all seriousness, if you {i}know{/i} something, you can talk to me. But only if you {i}know{/i} something.
Because if you don’t, I’m not going to just let you stand there and slander my friend when all he’s done wrong is be mad creepy. That alone describes like, 98%% of guys.
Guess I’m glad I dated a girl first, then.
Do you know something or not? Speak up.
No...
I barely even know him in the first place.
Ay! Welcome back, guys! How did- woah. Why does everybody look so sad and exhausted?
Uhh...things...took a bit of a strange turn...
What kind of turn exactly?...
Well...first...Sensei, uhh...
Let’s just say he had some trouble...umm...properly providing answers to...some of the questions...
But once that was over...we-
I lost.
Yasu destroyed me and she barely even knows Sensei.
It is not me who knows him, but-
Don’t try and make me feel better, Yasu. You won and you should get to be happy about that.
But here I am, once again rushing face first into things I think I can handle only to find out that everything is a lot bigger and harder than I think it is and no I am not talking about a penis.
It’s...It’s not like you didn’t get {i}any{/i} right! You did really well...Yasu just...did better at the...hard questions...
Just doing “well” isn’t good enough.
A while ago, there wasn’t a single day that would go by without me thinking of Sensei.

Whether it be some customer reminding me of him or something I saw on TV that I thought he’d be interested in or...any of the secrets I wanted to tell him. Or any of the jokes I thought he’d scoff at.
What use do I even have anymore if I can’t even be bothered to remember anything about him?
You can not remember what you never learned in the first place...
Didn’t stop {i}you...{/i}
Sensei...can you please...say something to Rin?...
She seems...really upset about all this...
It’s fine, Sana.
It’s my fault for letting him down in the first place.
I’d be upset with me too...
I walk to the left.
Uhh...
You good, dude?
I don’t know.
Uhh...
Well, on the bright side, at least I don’t have to be alone anymore! And that’s cool, right?
There’s no use staying upset about something that’s already in the past. So just...don’t let it get to you, alright?
It’s not exactly that easy.
Sure it is. We’ve got plenty of stuff left that we can do before the night’s over and...I’m in a good mood today, so yeah!
I’m just not really in the mood right now, Otoha.
Rin, seriously? It’s just a stupid contest. It’s not like it’s the end of your life or anything. Just move on so we can have fun.
Uh-oh.
Stupid?
Yeah. It was stupid. You were having a contest to see who pays more attention to our thirty-some-odd year old teacher. You should be happy you lost. It means you’re not a creep.
There’s nothing creepy about caring about someone, Otoha! Someone I barely get to see anymore because the only one I pay attention to is you!
And...And that’s somehow {i}my{/i} problem?
No! It’s mine! But it doesn’t help when you just throw it in my face like that and call me names for getting upset about a thing that’s very important to me!
Yo, chill. I didn’t mean it like-
Then how did you mean it?! Tell me!
Was this fate inevitable?
Or is the world among the lines where these ones do not form a knot?
Umm...I don’t know for sure, but...I think they were...acting a little weird yesterday, too...
I don’t...think it’s your fault, Yasu...I think it’s just...hard to...be in a relationship sometimes...
The saddest part is...the real difficulties have yet to even arise...
All that appears before us now is an aftereffect of the knowledge I was trusted with...being re-dispersed into the air and then your lungs...
But I wanted it to make you happy.
I wanted to disbelieve those whispers in the wind.
Instead, I have let them grow so loud that we must now face a storm...
I...don’t understand what any of that means...
It means that I am sorry...
And that even with these powers...and these ears...beneath the slimy facade that is my soft, pliable exoskeleton...
I am still only human.
The fuck is your problem?! Literally all I wanted to do was hang out with you. Is that really so bad?
No! What’s bad is you making me feel like shit all the time for thinking about anyone other than you!
I’m surprised you even {i}have{/i} time to think about me when all you {i}really{/i} ever do is think about yourself!
I left my club for you! I left my friends for you!
You have other friends!
What have you given up for me, huh?! Why am I the only person who should have to sacrifice the things I love to make this work?!
Do you love Sensei?
Yes! I do! Is that a problem?!
How do you love him, Rin?
What the fuck are you even talking about? He’s a precious friend.
{i}Was{/i} a precious friend. You’re the one who decided to leave him behind to date me. Remember?
But who’s the one who always tries to change the subject whenever I bring him up?
Why do you need to bring him up?
Who’s the one who gets jealous any time I make eye contact with someone I’ve had a crush on before?
Obviously me. But it’s not wrong for me to feel that way when you’re a walking mass of unrestrained hormones!
Do you think I’m going to just forget I’m dating you and spend those hormones on somebody else?!
I don’t know what you’re going to do! That’s the problem!
Besides, I wouldn’t even {i}have{/i} all of those hormones if you’d stop being A FUCKING PRUDE and just finger me already!
Okay, {i}that{/i} had to have snapped you out of it, right?
Snapped me out of what? What happened?
W...What the fuck do you think you’re yelling about?!

I’m angry! And sad! And I feel like shit for fucking up the one thing I thought I’d never fuck up! And it doesn’t help to have you come over and be like “Hey, Rin! I’m your girlfriend! Time to move on!”
That’s not what I was trying to do!
Then try harder!
You should {i}know{/i} how important Sensei is to me! So when you tell me that I’m getting upset over a “stupid contest,” yeah! I’m going to be mad!
It’s not like I lost to Ami or Ayane! I lost to {i}Yasu!{/i} YASU!

I’m losing the only connection I’ve {i}ever{/i} had with a male authority figure and you want me to just {i}move on{/i} and {i}hang out{/i} with you like nothing horrible is happening in the background?!
Things aren’t that easy for everyone!
What I {i}want{/i} is for you to stop getting so upset about relationships like that because it makes me feel like you’re falling for {i}them{/i} instead of me!
Well, to paraphrase the magnificent and super-cool, {i}TOTALLY{/i} not prudish Otoha Okakura...that’s your problem! Not mine!
Oh, fuck this! I’m going home!
Cool! Bye! Hope my “unrestrained hormones” don’t explode all over Kumon-mi and spread a bajillion pheromones across the city that signal to everyone how it’s okay to come put things in my vagina!
What the fuck are you even yelling now?! What does that mean?!
I don’t know! Just leave me alone!
Otoha walks off into the dark, but none of us follow her.
We probably should have.
This is not somewhere a young girl should be alone at night.
But we all want to leave as well.
And the bus stop is in the opposite direction.
When I sit down on the bus, I feel something poking out of my back pocket.
I reach for it, paying close attention to my surroundings to make sure no one is watching.
But when I inspect it, I find that it’s just a picture of a flower.
I hope the ride back is a quick one.
{i}Meanwhile, in a functional lesbian relationship...{/i}
God...I have no idea how you have the patience to do this every single day. I feel like I’ve poked myself in the eye a good seven hundred times by now.
And you’ll poke yourself seven hundred more if it means I get my yearly dose of Gothsako. There are simply some sacrifices that must be made in the name of love, my darling.
I wish you had more fantasies about me in jeans and no makeup.
I have fantasies about you in all forms of attire. But that does not mean I’m going to make you indulge me by forcing you to dress as my third grade teacher, Ms. Takeda.
Wakana, I love you, but we’ve been together for years now and I’m tired of hearing about Ms. Takeda.
Then talk about your first crush to even the playing field. Who was it again? Some sort of...actor? Musician?
Britney Spears.
Right, right. I forgot there was a time in your life where you weren’t fully dedicated to being swallowed by the darkness that is Wakana Watabe.
Or at least being {i}licked{/i} by her.
Not again. You’ve {i}licked{/i} me to completion five times today and are the reason I am currently reapplying my makeup in the first place. Please contain yourself. We have plans.
But I can only have sex with Gothsako one day out of every year. I need to make it count.
I already told you I’d be more than willing to do this on a weekly basis. {i}Just not right before we go out.{/i}
My darling, doing this on a weekly basis would cause it to lose its charm. I like having something to look forward to for the holidays.
Which is why I’m particularly excited for my upcoming {i}excursions{/i} with your Christmas elf variant. Remind me to cover our apartment in mistletoe, please.
You don’t need me to remind you. What I have learned over the years is that there are only four shades of Wakana — sleep, sex, work, and interior design.
The second I turn a blind eye to you, there will be mistletoe literally everywhere.
You should be happy you’ve found yourself such a predictable woman. Many people love that sort of thing.
I’d be happier if you’d actually help me with this instead of watching me struggle while fixing your hair.
Apologies, my sweet. But seeing as we have plans tonight, I can not allow my hair to be anything other than perfect.
Why? Trying to impress someone?
Of course.
I did take the liberty of inviting Ms. Takeda, after all.
You drive me insane.
Don’t worry, my kitten. I’m willing to share her.
Oh, are you now?
I can’t see why not. If anything, I welcome the challenge.
My skills with one woman are quite exemplary, as I’m sure you’ve noticed. I wonder if they’d hold up with a second?
Is that something you’re actually interested in?
Osako?
Threesomes, I mean.
We’ve never really had that discussion before.
My dear...you {i}are{/i} aware that I was just kidding, aren’t you?
Yeah, but like...
I mean, I’d {i}get it{/i} if that’s something you wanted to do. And if that will help with-
Hah...this again?
I just want you to be happy, Wakana.
I {i}am{/i} happy, love. And I mean that from the bottom of my heart.
There’s a “but” coming.
Knew it.
Do you know what would make me even {i}happier?{/i}
Hah...
Bed or couch?
Both?
We only have time for one.
Then...
Kitchen.
Fine.
But if you’re going to handcuff me to something, it can’t be the cabinet with our pots and pans in it. The handle is still loose from last time.
It’s okay to break things. We’re adults.
You know...sometimes, it really feels like all of the physical and stamina training I’ve endured my entire life was all to prepare me for {i}you.{/i}
And...would you change that if you could?
Absolutely not.
Let’s go break some cabinets.
{i}Osako and Wakana’s mutual lust for one another has increased to 9473056713254!{/i}
{i}First Floor: [dorm1war2points]\nSecond Floor: [dorm2war2points]{/i}
{i}About forty-five minutes later...{/i}
